verses.verse: A Song of the steps. They who trust in the Lord shall be like mount Sion; he who inhabiteth Jerusalem shall never be shaken.
Around her are mountains; and the Lord is around his people, from this time forth and forever;
for the Lord will not suffer the rod of the wicked to be over the inheritance of the righteous; that the righteous may not stretch forth their hands to iniquities.
Do good, O Lord, to the good, and to them who are upright in heart.
But them who turn aside into crooked ways, the Lord will drive away with the workers of iniquity. Peace be upon Israel!
